sourcesContent:
<template >
<Navbar 
:pages="pages"
:active-page="activePage"

>
  
</Navbar>

<!--router-view></router-view-->
<create-advert
:advert-created="advertCreated">
</create-advert>
<pageViewer
v-if="pages.length>0"
:page="pages[activePage]"
>

</pageViewer>
</template>
<script>

import pageViewer from './components/pageViewer.vue';
import Navbar from './components/Navbar.vue';
import createAdvert from './components/createAdvert.vue';

export default{
    components: {
        pageViewer,
        Navbar,
        createAdvert
    },
    data(){
        return{
            activePage: 0,
            pages: [],
        
        };
    },
    
    created(){
      this.getPages();  
      this.$bus.$on('navbarLinkActived',(index)=>{
        this.activePage=index;
      });
    },
    methods:{
        async getPages(){
            let res=await fetch('pages.json');
            let data=await res.json();
            this.pages=data;
        },
        advertCreated(advert){
            this.pages.push(advert)

        },
    }
}
</script>
